General.Name: Seazen Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Seazen Holdings Co., Ltd engages in the development and sale of real estate properties in China. The company is involved in the development of residential and commercial properties. It also engages in the property leasing and management business. The company was formerly known as Future Land Holdings Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Seazen Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Fuyu Development Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Seazen Holdings Tower, Building No.6, Shanghai, China, 200062
